name: Dodge
text: Attach this to your character for one turn.\n\nDamage you take is reduced by your LUCK.

name: Block
text: attachach this to your character for one turn.\n\nPhysical Damage you take is reduced by half.

name: Mage Armor
text: Attach this to your character for two turns.\n\nDamage you take is reduced by 2.

name: Cleave
text: Deal W damage to each adjacent enemy.

name: Sabotage
text: Attach this to an Enemy.\n\n When this character takes a major action they take it against themselves instead. Then they discard this card.

name: Second Wind
text: Target ally shuffles their graveyard into their library. gains 5 hp. and draws a card

name: Magic Missile
text: Up to two target enemies take 5 magic damage

name: Taunt
text: Attach this to your character for one turn.\n\nAdjacent enemies can't use major actions unless they target you.

name: Assassinate
text: Deal 7 damage to target enemy then attach this to your character for one turn.\n\n Damage that you take is increased by 1.

name: Purify
text: Kill target undead creature or draw a card.

name: Shifting Earth
text: Move up to 2 targets. Those targets may not move during their next turn.

name: Duel
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent target then attach this card to that target for one turn.\n\nThis character can't take actions unless they target you.

name: Poison
text: Attach this to an Enemy for 2 turns.\n\nAt the start of this character's turn they take 4 poison damage

name: Sunburst
text: Deal 3 holy damage to each enemy.

name: Blinding Spray
text: Up to 3 enemies attack as if their opponents are dodging until your next turn.

name: Surge
text: Regain 5 life. Attach this card to your character.\n\nDamage dealt to you by 2.

name: Sunder
text: Attach this to an Enemy for one turn.\n\nReduce all of target's damage resistances by 5. They can't go lower than 0.

name: Mass Heal
text: Each ally regains 5 hp.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 5 fire damage to target enemy and each enemy adjacent to them.

name: Dancing Blade
text: Deal 3 damage. then you may move.

name: Siphon Life
text: Deal 3 Holy damage. Then heal an Ally for the damage dealt

name: Chill Wind
text: Up to two targets can't take Minor actions during their next turn. Draw a Card.

name: Double Slash
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent target. then deal W damage to an adjacent target.

name: Feint
text: Attach this to an Enemy for one turn.\n\nThe next time target enemy attacks you prevent up to 5 damage from that attack. Then deal W to them. Then discard this card.

name: Holy Aura
text: Attach this to an ally for two turn.\n\nAll damage this character does is increased by 2 Holy.

name: Kidney Punch
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent enemy. Draw a Card.

name: Sleep
text: Discard a card. Attach this to an Enemy for one turn.\n\nThis character can't take actions.
